branchCategory.name: NC(D)Q2-Z, Compact Cylinder Double Acting, Single Rod, Environmental Options
branchCategory.description: The NCQ2 compact cylinder is the inch version of the world's best selling pneumatic cylinder and can be supported globally. The NCQ2 is available in 13 bore sizes from 12mm to 160mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. A large variety of standard options make it one of the most versatile cylinder series on the market. For mounting flexibility, it is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.
